thread.title: Shia LaBeouf Shuts Down Anti-Trump Livestream After Shots Fired Nearby
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf Shuts Down Anti-Trump Livestream After Shots Fired Nearby

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Shia LaBeouf Shuts Down Anti-Trump Livestream After Shots Fired Nearby
text:
After recently relocating from The Museum of the Moving Image in Queens, New York to the El Rey Theater in Albuquerque, New Mexico, Shia LaBeouf’s anti-Donald Trump live stream protest has been shut down once again, and once again due to being “a flashpoint for violence” and a threat to public safety.
On Monday, a camera outside of the El Rey Theater, as well as surrounding areas, were spray-painted over with the phrase “Reject False Idols.” Since, LaBeouf has informed that early this morning gunshots were heard nearby the protest location, forcing the effort to come to a halt.
We have taken the stream down after shots were reported in the area. The safety of everybody participating in our project is paramount.
— Shia LaBeouf (@thecampaignbook) February 23, 2017 

For now, there has been no word regarding a direction correlation between the gun shots and the anti-Trump protest, but Twitter users and neighboring individuals have now taken the time to report that guns have been frequently flashed on the live stream during the gathering.
The gunfire was some blocks away from cam. Safety first #hewillnotdivideus 
— Harald Wurlitzer (@LexInterna) February 23, 2017 

@LexInterna Two other people have showed guns on the stream – their deliberate choice of location has backfired on them. #hewillnotdivideus 
— Peasie_Söderlund (@Peasie1965) February 23, 2017 

#hewillnotdivideus #hwndu 
NO ONE can say ppl were not getting warned, BLOOD ON YOUR HANDS! @thecampaignbook @MauricioPaints @NastjaRonkko pic.twitter.com/cP06RY4rgS 
— KirkwoodJams (@kjammer17) February 23, 2017
